messages.message: Thank you for connecting! Coding leaves much to be desired.
hey brian - it sure does ! I was actually interested in learning about Mindtree and if we could partner in some way - love the idea of real time connection of learners and educators.

Probably! If you are in to education you should talk to this guy:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/zeusrz/
He wants to put together a team to take EdTech 10 steps forward. You might be the missing link, not enough companies have a security mindset.
